0D2B7D9E.Line39.BAE4: Do you know how to repair it?

159F46C3.Line37.7FA05: Oh, no. This is worse than I thought. It must have been damaged when Yorin--Astaroth...

67ECA222.Line45.7FA05: There's a village near here. We'll see if they have what we need. Meet me there when you can.

7BAACD41.Line35.7FA05: Come on, come on! You old fool, what's wrong with it...why won't--

D7101683.Line19.7FA05: We'll need rare materials--quicksilver, to start. And tools, alchemical tools.
